sakai:title: Content - Any content
sakai:shortDescription: Search for any type node of node that matches the searchterm.
sakai:parameters: {"name" : "q", "description" : "The term you want to match against. This will match any property on the node"}
sakai:description: Search trough the entire repository looking for nodes that have properties matching the searchterm.
Note: This will NOT match the content of a node.
If you are looking for valid content results in the repository it is adviced you use either propercontent.json or on of the files searches.
